member.name: T:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions
member.summary: Provides static methods for converting string values to other types.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given string value to its MD5Hash representation.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Coverts the given string value to its boolean representation.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given string value to its short representation.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given string value to its integer representation.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given string value to its long representation.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given string value to its DateTime representation.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalizes the first letter of the given string value.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the string value between the two given strings.
member.param: String from where to get the result.
Index from where the search for the string will begin.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts all cyrillic letters from the given string value to latin letters.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts all latin letters from the given string value to cyrillic letters.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Transforms the given string value from an invalid username to a valid username.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Transforms the given string value to a valid latin file name.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the first characters in a string format from the given string value.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the file extension from the given string value.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given file extension to its content type.

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given string value to its byte array representation.
